import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Component Factory" />

# Default Component Factory

```jsx
const DefaultComponentFactory = R.cond([
	[R.propEq('type', 'grid'), DefaultGridViewFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'criteria'), DefaultCriteriaFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'treeView'), DefaultFolderTreeViewFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'activityFeed'), DefaultActivityFeedFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'searchTemplate'), DefaultSearchTemplateFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'viewTabSearchTemplate'), DefaultViewTabSearchTemplateFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'chart'), DefaultChartFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'indicator'), DefaultIndicatorFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'iframe'), DefaultIframeViewFactory],
	[R.propEq('type', 'rtfTextEditor'), DefaultRtfEditorFactory],
]);
```
